rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that adheres to Vastu by using the east side as the primary entry, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious lobby that provides direct access to living areas and serves as a transitional space in accordance with colonial aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An elegantly designed dining area facing east to harness auspicious energy, in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A central living space that connects with the entrance and courtyard, designed to encourage social interaction while adhering to colonial aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen incorporating functional layouts while integrating Vastu by placing it away from the entrance for energy balance, with east facing windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom ensuring privacy and light. Positioned on the north-east side in line with Vastu, fostering a peaceful environment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master suite offering ample space with en-suite bathroom. Positioned on the north-west for stability and relaxation according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: A multifunctional space suitable for family gatherings, placed adjacent to the lobby and ensuring a harmonious balance as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A serene library area dedicated to reading and relaxation, located near the family room for intellectual pursuits. Designed with ample natural light from east windows.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A landscaped central courtyard that provides ventilation and a sense of openness, ensuring positive energy flow in the home.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A private gym located adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience and privacy, designed with natural lighting while ensuring optimal ventilation.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entryway that aligns with the east to allow maximum light and positive energy in accordance with Vastu.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Access to a balcony providing views over the central courtyard, designed for both aesthetics and ventilation.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A service entrance positioned on the west side, consistent with the plot orientation while ensuring functional access.
